channel.title: Server does not display all GameObjects/NPC's
channel.description:
When I try to add GameObjects/Npc's that are in a specific area, they just don't pop-up.
If I change the X and Y to other values, which aren't near that area, they do pop-up.
I can't find where I have to fix this, any idea's?

item.title: Server does not display all GameObjects/NPC's
item.dc:creator: @Kapitein_Bier Kapitein Bier
item.description:
@Kapitein_Bier wrote:

If I use the same GameObjectLoc.xml.gz / NpcLoc.xml.gz on a fresh source then this does work.

It is as if the GameObject Locations and Npc Locations get spawned between a specific X and Y, and if there are objects/npcs defined in the xml.gz they that are out of range, they just get ignored.

Fixed it

Replaced: //for (GameObjectLoc gameObject : (List<GameObjectLoc>) PersistenceManager.load("locs/GameObjectLoc.xml.gz")) { // if(Constants.GameServer.F2P_WILDY && Formulae.isP2P(true, gameObject)) // continue; // if (Formulae.isP2P(gameObject) && !World.isMembers()) // continue; // world.registerGameObject(new GameObject(gameObject)); //} (yea I added slashes)

With:

for(GameObjectLoc gameObject : (List<GameObjectLoc>)PersistenceManager.load("locs/GameObjectLoc.xml.gz")) {
			world.registerGameObject(new GameObject(gameObject));
		}

Same goes for NPC’s and such.

Read full topic
item.source: Server does not display all GameObjects/NPC's
